title: Jigoku de naze warui (Why Don't You Play in Hell?)
synopsis: Ambitious young film director Hirata (Hiroki Hasegawa) and his crew get caught in the middle of a bloody Yakuza war sparked by the vengeful wife of a powerful crime-boss in this outrageous action opus from writer/director Sion Sono (Suicide Club, Love Exposure). Tak Sakaguchi, Shinichi Tsutsumi, and Jun Kunimara co-star. ~ Jason Buchanan, Rovi
